name: Los Angeles International Airport - LAX - Airport Tour
description:
Thanks for watching this brief, partial tour of Los Angeles International Airport!

As a lifelong traveler, I never get tired of the process of boarding a plane going somewhere new and exciting and one of the little pleasures I enjoy is seeing a new airport on my way to my destination.

Los Angeles International Airport is one of the busiest airports in the world, and one of the busiest international destinations in the U.S. This level of traffic makes it large and potentially unmanageable, but with a little preparation, you can navigate this airport easily and painlessly, and you might even have some fun along the way!

The airport features nine terminals, but this video covers only three: Terminals 2, 3, and B, the Tom Bradley International Terminal. You won't get bored in LAX, with plenty of places to explore. While the airport is as modern as any you'll find around the world, it still has some historic charms, too.

This video was recorded in November 2019, before the COVID-19 pandemic.

While travel around the world is on hold for many of us, I hope you enjoy this chance to explore one of the most exciting airports in the world. As soon as it's safe, I hope to see you all in the skies!
